issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.raw:
New gazebo2 and gazebo3 versions are in the OSRF repository:

* [gazebo2 version 2.2.2-7 on Trusty](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo2-debbuilder/36/)
* [gazebo3 version 3.0.0-5 on Trusty](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo3-debbuilder/109)

Both are built against patched version of libboost. @brianaxelrod could you please confirm that it fix the issue for you? If so, I will ask the sync from the ROS repository.
content.html:
New gazebo2 and gazebo3 versions are in the OSRF repository:

  • gazebo2 version 2.2.2-7 on Trusty
  • gazebo3 version 3.0.0-5 on Trusty

Both are built against patched version of libboost. @brianaxelrod could you please confirm that it fix the issue for you? If so, I will ask the sync from the ROS repository.
